articles.author: Aviral Shukla
articles.title: ODI World Cup 2023: India legend Anil Kumble gives huge statement on Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli after India's defeat in the final - Cricket Times
articles.description: Australia thrashed India by six wickets in the final clash of the ODI World Cup 2023. Anil Kumble expressed his opinion on Rohit Sharma and Virat Kohli.
articles.content: In the aftermath of India‘s disheartening loss in the ODI World Cup 2023 final against Australia, the cricketing fraternity finds itself divided in opinions on the performance of the Men in Blue. The… [+1793 chars]
